overview:
Bryan most recently served as Senior Vice President and General Manager of Creative Solutions, Adobeâ€™s largest business unit. Bryan led product strategy, marketing and product development for Adobeâ€™s flagship software applications, including Photoshop, the Creative Suite, Dreamweaver, Flash and Illustrator.

In his 14 years at Adobe Systems, Bryan held key management positions including Senior Vice President and General Manager, Digital Imaging and Video and Vice President of Marketing, Professional Publishing Solutions. He was responsible for new product development and marketing as well as the acquisition and product integration strategies that established Adobeâ€™s overwhelming leadership in digital imaging and multimedia and web publishing.

In April 2009, he was hired as the Senior Vice President of Applications Products at Yahoo!

relationships.title: Senior Vice President of Applications Products
